T02D2797:158b-1: chen po gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2797:158b-2: ting 'dzin goms pa'i gang zag gis //
T02D2797:158b-3: bden rtog ma lus bzlog phyir dang //
T02D2797:158b-4: lha yi dri ma 'ang spangs pa'i phyir //
T02D2797:158b-5: gzugs brnyan gzugs can man ngag bri //
T02D2797:158b-6: skye bos rab dben nyams dga'i gzhir //
T02D2797:158b-9: de dbus 'dren pa snang bar bya //
T02D2797:158b-10: shar gyi 'dab mar khri btsugs la //
T02D2797:158b-11: de steng shin tu dri med gzugs //
T02D2797:158b-12: brtson pa'i cha byad rgyan mang mnga' //
T02D2797:158b-13: dkar dmar la sogs bdag yid ltar //
T02D2797:158b-14: chu nang rab dang zla ba dang //
T02D2797:158b-15: gzugs ltar de yi sprul pa gsal //
T02D2797:158b-16: shel dang me long la sogs ngos //
T02D2797:158b-17: dkyil 'khor lte bar mngon par bzhugs //
T02D2797:158b-18: drang srong gtso bo sgyu ma'i rnam thar ni //
T02D2797:158b-19: gdul dka' 'dul phyir sna tshogs skur ston yang //
T02D2797:158b-20: de tshe de don de nyid gzugs mi mnga' //
T02D2797:158b-21: de nyid 'dir ni stong nyid gzugs zhes brjod //
T02D2797:158b-22: ma dag lus kyi dri ma thams cad las //
T02D2797:158b-23: shin tu ring gyur phun tshogs skur snang la //
T02D2797:158b-24: de nyid mkha' ltar dmigs pa rab zhi ba //
T02D2797:158b-25: dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes sku yin no //
T02D2797:158b-26: byis pa rnams ni kha dog dbyibs dbye bas //
T02D2797:158b-27: snang ba ji bzhin don de bzhin zhes rtogs //
T02D2797:158b-28: mkhas rnams ji ltar snang ba sna tshogs nyid //
T02D2797:158b-29: gang snang de ltar de tsam zhi bar shes //
T02D2797:158b-30: ji ltar lha yi sbyor ba 'dir mtshan med //
T02D2797:158b-31: de ltar gzugs sogs dngos kun yang dben na //
T02D2797:158b-32: shes rab kyis brtags blo gros rim gnyis la //
T02D2797:158b-33: mkhas pas mtshan mar mi bya smos ci dgos //
T02D2797:158b-34: de ltar lha dang lha'i rang bzhin dang chos thams
T02D2797:158b-35: cad kyi dag pa rtogs par byas nas rten cing
T02D2797:158b-36: 'brel bar 'byung bas mngon par sprul pa'i lha'i sku
T02D2797:158b-37: phyag rgya chen po dmigs te /
T02D2797:158b-38: bdag nyid rim pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i sku gsung
T02D2797:158b-39: thugs mchan ma nye bar zhi ba'i mthar thug par
T02D2797:158b-40: gyur pa dang bsre bar bya'o //
T02D2797:158b-41: de nas khrus dang byug pa la sogs pa sngon du song bas /
T02D2797:158b-42: phyag 'tshal ba dang bskor ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas sdig pa spang ba dang tshogs bsgrubs te /
T02D2797:158b-43: dngos su 'byor pa dang yid las byung ba'i yo
T02D2797:158b-44: byad dpag tu med pas yang dag par mchod de
T02D2797:158b-45: / dri ma sbyang ba'i phyir sngags 'di bzla'o //
T02D2797:158b-46: aom a'a:hr'i:ma h'a ka pra ti bi pa ru pa
T02D2797:158b-47: bi shuddha ta t'a dzny'a n'a ma ma tsitt'a ma
T02D2797:158b-48: dye pra ti sth'a ra h'um /
T02D2797:158b-49: rnam dag ye shes mchog sprul pas //
T02D2797:159b-0: sku bstan nyid @159b kyi thugs hr'i:yig /'od mdzad me yis 'gro kun gyi //
T02D2797:159b-1: 'dzin pa gnyis bsregs gzugs brnyan gyur //
T02D2797:159b-2: dri ma med dang rnam mi rtog / gdul bya dad ni yang dag la //
T02D2797:159b-3: snang dang mi snang dbyer med gsungs //
